Group (2004-2023):
SG WANNABE

Introduction

Lee Seokhoon is a South Korean singer, songwriter, musical actor, and TV personality under C9 Entertainment. He is best known for being the vocalist of the band SG Wannabe. He also served as a vocal trainer on the Produce 101 Series.
